title: Crafting
content:
Crafting in Baldur's Gate 3 features the various aspects relevant to the crafting mechanic of the game. This allows players to gain additional equipment or Items by combining other items and equipment. Players can find detailed information on how the crafting system works, different Crafting processes as well as the different recipes, combinations, and materials or ingredients used to forge different items and possibly gear such as Armor and Weapons.
